General.Name: Chiu Ting Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Chiu Ting Machinery Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells bench top and stationery woodworking machinery worldwide. It offers table saws, parallelogram jointers, and snipe planer products. The company sells its products to importers, distributors, and retailers. Chiu Ting Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
